evidence_span: Circumferential variations in temperature were checked by attaching thermocouples on opposite sides of the specimen. This was done on ten specimens heated at various heating rates to 60 C/s and the instantaneous temperatures were found to agree within ±15 C.

evidence_span: a series of tests was run to measure creep-rupture strength of Zircaloy-4 in an inert atmosphere. These measurements were made on specimens of 2.54-cm gage length fabricated from 0.08- cm sheet stock cut parallel to the rolling direction.
